Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Sometimes AI really gives excellent feedback like at exactly what point i have done my mistake but it is only when i give it the criteria the teacher gave me or else it gives random feedback

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: yes the feedback from AI is often plain and does not encourage us how to do it again if we have to do it. But the teachers feedback tells us where and how to improve it so next time i can achieve a full mark

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Major difference i see is AI does not know about my particular course and the syllabus so it gives a more generic feedback which is sometimes good but most cases are not relevant to me
